{/* Hero Section */}

Taarini: AI-Powered Drone for Drowning Detection

Using advanced drone vision and cutting-edge AI models to detect and rescue drowning individuals in real-time, saving lives through technology.

Go to AI Detection Open Rescue Dashboard
{/* About Section */}

About Taarini Project

Our advanced AI system combines computer vision, machine learning, and autonomous drone technology to create the fastest and most reliable drowning detection and rescue system.

{/* Feature Cards */}

Real-Time Detection

Our YOLOv8 and U-Net models process drone footage in real-time, identifying potential drowning situations within seconds.

Computer Vision

Advanced computer vision algorithms analyze body postures, movement patterns, and water conditions to ensure accurate detection.

Life Saving

Immediate GPS coordinates transmission to rescue teams ensures the fastest possible response time for emergency situations.

Autonomous Drones

Fleet of autonomous drones equipped with high-resolution cameras and AI processing capabilities for comprehensive coverage.

24/7 Monitoring

Continuous surveillance of high-risk areas including beaches, pools, and water recreation facilities for maximum safety.

High Accuracy

96.8% accuracy rate in drowning detection with minimal false positives, ensuring reliable emergency response activation.

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Save Lives?

Experience the future of water safety with our AI-powered drowning detection system.

Test AI Detection View Live Dashboard
